name: Bamboo Burn
author: Nuchala
notes:
Most brainless KoG I got so far. 
From legend 1 to KoG in 19 games (2 losses were the mirror match and the other was bc 1 got second and countered by eco, mystical spirit of the forest ). 
I didn't play 3 into the void and black pendant bc I only had 2. 
This deck is next level cancer and I wouldn't recommand building this bc 
1) It is pure cancer
2) It's 2x3 UR from 2 boxes 
3) Cancer
4) Konami will probably ban it 
5) CANCER 
#bansprite
